message: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1 near "INNER": syntax error.
details:
[18-May-2025 15:33:18 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

UPDATE wp_postmeta INNER JOIN wp_posts ON wp_posts.ID = wp_postmeta.post_id SET meta_key = '_email' WHERE meta_key = 'email' AND post_type = 'feedback'

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: UPDATE wp_postmeta INNER JOIN wp_posts ON wp_posts.ID = wp_postmeta.post_id SET meta_key = :param0 WHERE rowid IN (SELECT rowid FROM wp_postmeta WHERE meta_key = :param1 AND post_type = :param2 ) | parameters: _email, email, feedback
